content: tranquil bloom is a calming nature-inspired mandala pattern designed to bring peace and beauty into your space worked in soft soothing tones with cotton yarn this pattern features a balanced mix of solid and open stitches creating a delicate floral effect perfect as a decorative piece wall hanging or table centerpiece it s a peaceful project for mindful crocheting available for free on my blog free pattern link 1 1 https //joyofcreationdiy blogspot com/2025/06/tranquil-bloom-manadala html
